info.name: Tumblr Dashboard - Blue Universe
info.description:
A simple dark blue Dashboard theme with a galaxy background.  The theme is designed to be compatible and viewable with nearly all the pages on the site (Search section, followers/following, Documentation pages, etc).

Frequently updated, developed in Firefox, tested in Firefox and Chrome.
info.additionalInfo:
Update 31-Jan-2017
  • Fixed multiple transparent backgrounds in the transparent post boxes
Update v2.6.1 4-Nov-2016
  • Fix to maintain background color in peeper/popover blog
Update v2.6 / 18-Dec-2015
  • Color corrections for all new post control icons
Update v2.6 / 12-Dec-2015
  • Color correction for the new paper plane icon
  • Color corrections for the Discovery page and corrections on links on reblog forms
Update v2.5 / 7-Sept-2015
  • Correction updates for the Sept. 1st tumblr updates
Update v2.4 / 3-Aug-2015
  • Corrected text in the reblog boxes for the new reblog-trees and cleaned up the font highlighting in the Linked posts headers
Update v2.3.9 / 25-June-2015
  • Re-corrected underlining of links and color correction in Link posts
  • Color correction for edited links in the Inbox
Update v2.3.8 / 8-May-2015
  • Fixed appearance of link posts, and corrected background color for rapid recs
Update v2.3.7 / 10-Apr-2015
  • Corrected colors for the new header bar, changed it to a unified color scheme
  • Corrected the bug on the search page in Chrome where the background would move and break
Update v2.3.6 / 12-Mar-2015
  • Color correction for the new source tag on the post footers
  • Color correction for pop up notifications
Update v2.3.5 / 17-Feb-2015
  • Editing your own posts no longer appear as transparent blue or solid blue posts, which was due to the last tumblr update. Edited post forms should now show up correctly as white forms.
  • Restored the standard text decoration of underlined links
Update v2.3.4 / 29-Jan-2015
  • Color corrections the dog-ear permalink in the in-dash blogs, settings page, & misc cleanup
Update v2.3.3 / 13-Jan-2015
  • Added a small gradient to the post footers so the post controls are more visible
Update v2.3.2 / 6-Jan-2015
  • Corrected border glow on avatars due to the new sticky avatars
Update v2.3.2 / Dec-11/2014
  • Fixes for Discovery / Recommended blogs sections
Update v2.3.1 / Dec-8-2014
  • Fix for the settings page background & other cleanup for indash blogs
Update v2.3 / Oct-30-2014
  • Updates for tumblr update 10/30 fixing the top header, right sidebar controls, and various other fixes.
Update v2.2.6 / 14-Oct-2014
  • Color correction for the search boxes
Update v2.2.4 / 17-Sept-2014
  • Minor color corrections on search page and follow buttons on posts
Update v2.2.2 / 28-Aug-2014
  • Added opacity controls to the post control buttons (like/reblog/etc.)
Update v2.2 / 13-Aug-2014
  • Removed tumblr blue backgrounds on the left and right columns of the dashboard
  • All post containers have been changed from a white background to transparent with transition effects
  • Various bug fixes for best compatibility with the in-dash blog features
Update v1.6 / 24-June-2014
  • Reset the proper colors for the Activity page
  • Cleaned up the search bar on the Tagged search page
Update v1.5 / 16-June-2014
  • Minor bug fix, content background color fix for the /tagged/ page

Update v1.4 / 12-May-2014

  • Fixed missing background on the search page

Update v1.3 / 3-Feb-2014

  • Theme is now active for users with SSL enabled
  • Minor fixes to the search page

Update v1.2 / 30-Jan-2014

  • Removed the bar of blue background from the top of the search page

Update v1.1 / 14-Jan-2014

  • Updated the "dog ear" permalink button to a cleaner version
  • Removed the blue highlight and gradient from the Recommended Blogs section
  • Made the Tumblr and Web search buttons in the main search box more visible
